fulltext:
Hieu Hong Hoang  
hoanghonghieu@gmail.com  
0973 912019 
Objectives  
Find an appropriate company with my ability. Cultivate skill, self-improvement. Willing to learning new 
technologies.   
Technologies  
C++ C Python Opencv FFMPEG 
Experience   
Developer, DMP 
February 2019 – Now 
C++ Python 
• 
Develop the image processing library: implement a wrapper library for FPGA functions. The library 
supports : Harris corners, optical flow, canny edge …  
• 
Detect seven-segment led: training and inference the number by Yolo. 
Developer, FPT Software 
July 2018 – January 2019 
C++ 
• 
Implement EMV specification for contactless card (POS system). 
• 
Write development document: state diagram, class diagram, sequence diagram. 
Developer, Technology company Softfront 
January 2015 – March 2018 
C Opencv Python 
• 
Integrate the hardware video codecs to library. 
• 
CNG(Comfort noise generator) : implement CNG using LPC(linear predictive coding).  
• 
Fail product detection: analyze image using OpenCV to detect fail product. 
• 
WebRTC echo canceller: integrate WebRTC echo canceller to library.  
• 
Research protocol to transfer media: modify the RUDP to transfer the media data. 
…………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………...  
Developer, Technology company Softfoundry    
January 2014 – December 2014 
C Matlab CUDA 
• 
Research the intra prediction and inter prediction in H265. Using Cuda to improve the performance. 
• 
Evaluates H265 codec (integrate, measure the performance in Window and Android).  
• 
Use Cuda to improve the performance of comparing audio matrix (in frequency domain).  
• 
Packetization in video: FUA. 
…………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………..  
Developer, Computing center-Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology (HCMUT)  
              June 2013 – December 2013  
C    
• 
Streaming video using FFMPEG: libavformat, libavcodec, libavdevice. 
• 
Produce the lecture video (record, encoding, public …). 
…………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………..  
Implement Stereo Matching, Course project – HCMUT                               September 2011 - February 2012 
Matlab C++  
• 
Research Stereo Matching: provide two image of a scene from two camera, calculate depth map 
(distance between camera and object in that scene).  
• 
Implement the graph cut edge in graph, which presents the relationship between neighbor pixels or 
two pixel in two image, use maximum flow algorithm to cut the graph and get depth map.

B.E. Computer Science, Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology                                        2008 - 2013
